summary: The diff implements all four requirements: REQ-1 fixes the Ready tab filter, REQ-2 adds RB order splitting with supply quantity dialog, REQ-3 addresses iOS PDF export issues, and REQ-4 embeds design images in PDF/JPEG exports. All core functionality appears to be implemented with proper validation, error handling, and UI integration.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module added with genericName and karigarName fields to Order type
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention adding new fields to the Order data structure or requiring a migration. The addition of genericName and karigarName fields to the Order type was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Master design mappings and karigar management features
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff shows extensive functionality for master design mappings, design images storage, karigar management (add/get karigars), and master design Excel uploads. None of these features were requested in the BuildRequest, which focused only on Ready tab filtering, RB order splitting, and export enhancements.
